title: JobJump
author: Stan Xu
excerpt: JobJump is your AI Copilot in video interviews. As a Chrome extension, it works with Zoom, MS Teams and Google Meet. It automatically recognizes questions and offers concise, targeted answer hints based on your resume, helping you land your desired job!
text: Free OptionsJobJump is your AI Copilot in video interviews. As a Chrome extension, it works with Zoom, MS Teams and Google Meet. It automatically recognizes questions and offers concise, targeted answer hints based on your resume, helping you land your desired job!Launched inBrowser Extensions Chrome Extensions Artificial Intelligence +1 byJobJump- AI Interview Copilot
html:
Free Options

JobJump is your AI Copilot in video interviews. As a Chrome extension, it works with Zoom, MS Teams and Google Meet. It automatically recognizes questions and offers concise, targeted answer hints based on your resume, helping you land your desired job!
